Articles.Content: I've been playing Kerbal space program enhanced on Xbox for a while now but i recently wanted to get back into the game. I wanted to use mouse and keyboard to make building and piloting easier. Unfortunately the keyboard does not seem to be working on KSP while it works on many other games. The mouse does work correctly and apparently there's supposed to be full mouse and keyboard Support. The keyboard I'm using is a USB dongle. Could anyone help out with this?

I am having the EXACT same problem. Worked one time and then stopped. What keyboard and mouse and xbox are you using?

Edited March 26, 2023 by Kerbal Space Noob
Im trying to help.
